keyMoments.title: Battle Against Miss Doublefinger Begins
keyMoments.description: Nami is found by Miss Doublefinger and decides to fight using the new weapon Usopp made for her.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Nami's first major solo battle in the series.

keyMoments.title: Clima-Tact Weapon Debut
keyMoments.description: Nami reveals and uses the Clima-Tact weapon for the first time in battle.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Nami's signature weapon that she will use throughout the entire series.
keyMoments.quote: This is the weapon Usopp made for me! Time to see what it can do!

keyMoments.title: Discovery of Clima-Tact's Combat Features
keyMoments.description: Nami discovers the battle configurations in the manual, learning about Heat Ball, Cool Ball, and Thunder Ball.
keyMoments.significance: Transforms the Clima-Tact from toy to weapon, allowing Nami to combine the elements with her meteorological knowledge.
keyMoments.quote: Wait! There are battle configurations at the back of the manual!

keyMoments.title: First Successful Use of Cyclone Tempo
keyMoments.description: Nami unintentionally creates her first successful combat technique, generating a powerful gust of wind.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Nami can use the Clima-Tact effectively in combat.

keyMoments.title: Mirage Tempo Saves Nami
keyMoments.description: Nami uses Mirage Tempo to create an illusion of herself, avoiding Miss Doublefinger's attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's strategic thinking and quick learning ability.
keyMoments.quote: That was Mirage Tempo! My Clima-Tact can create mirages!

keyMoments.title: Declaration of Readiness to Fight
keyMoments.description: Nami confidently declares she is now ready to truly fight Miss Doublefinger.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Nami's evolution from support character to capable solo combatant.
keyMoments.quote: Now I'm ready to actually fight!

abilities.description: A three-piece staff weapon that can manipulate weather by emitting heat, cool, and electrical charges.
Creates doves as a party trick.
Produces flowers as a party trick.
Springs out a boxing glove as a party trick.
Creates a powerful gust of wind by combining heat and cool air.
Creates mirages and optical illusions using heat manipulation.

reveals.information: Received the Clima-Tact weapon from Usopp
Can fight effectively in solo combat using intelligence and meteorological knowledge

name.japanese: ミス・ダブルフィンガー

keyMoments.title: Finds and Attacks Nami
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger finds Nami hiding and attacks her with spike abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Initiates the battle that will showcase both her devil fruit powers and Nami's new weapon.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Toge Toge no Mi Techniques
keyMoments.description: Shows multiple spike-based techniques including Double Stinger, Stinger Finger, Stinger Hedgehog, Sewing Stinger, and Stinger Step.
keyMoments.significance: Displays the full versatility of the Spike-Spike Fruit abilities.

abilities.description: Creates spikes on both hands to attack.
Transforms fingers into sharp spikes for piercing attacks.
Covers body in spikes like a hedgehog for defense and offense.
Uses spikes to pierce and immobilize opponents.
Creates spikes on feet for enhanced mobility and attack.

reveals.information: Full range of Toge Toge no Mi techniques demonstrated

keyMoments.title: Interrogates King Cobra About Pluton
keyMoments.description: Crocodile questions King Cobra about the location of the ancient weapon Pluton.
keyMoments.significance: First mention of Pluton in the series, revealing Crocodile's true ambition.
keyMoments.quote: Tell me, King Cobra... where is Pluton?

keyMoments.title: Reveals His True Goal
keyMoments.description: Crocodile explains he needs Pluton to establish military power and counter the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Crocodile's ambitions extend far beyond ruling Arabasta.
keyMoments.quote: I need a weapon to establish my military power and be able to counter the World Government forces!

keyMoments.title: Reveals Bomb Plot to Vivi
keyMoments.description: Informs Vivi and Cobra about the bomb set to explode in Palace Square at 4:30.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the crisis and puts a time limit on saving Alubarna.
keyMoments.quote: I've planted a bomb to explode in the Palace Square at 4:30!

keyMoments.title: Claims Luffy is Dead
keyMoments.description: Tells Vivi that Luffy is dead and blames her for his death.
keyMoments.significance: Psychologically tortures Vivi to break her spirit.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy would have still been alive had he not gotten involved with you!

reveals.information: Seeks the ancient weapon Pluton to challenge the World Government
Knows about Pluton and that it's connected to Arabasta

keyMoments.title: Learns of Luffy's Supposed Death
keyMoments.description: Crocodile tells Vivi that Luffy is dead, causing her to despair.
keyMoments.significance: Crushes Vivi's hope and puts her in psychological anguish.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Pluton Revelation
keyMoments.description: Present when Crocodile interrogates her father about Pluton.
keyMoments.significance: Learns the true depth of Crocodile's plan.

keyMoments.title: Learns About the Bomb
keyMoments.description: Hears about Crocodile's plan to bomb Palace Square.
keyMoments.significance: Realizes thousands of her people will die if she can't stop it.

name.japanese: ネフェルタリ・コブラ

keyMoments.title: Interrogated About Pluton
keyMoments.description: Crocodile demands to know the location of Pluton, shocking Cobra that he knows this name.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that Cobra knows about Pluton and its connection to Arabasta.
keyMoments.quote: How do you know that name?!

reveals.information: Knows about Pluton and is shocked Crocodile knows the name

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Pluton Interrogation
keyMoments.description: Present when Crocodile interrogates King Cobra about Pluton.

keyMoments.title: Present During Pluton Interrogation
keyMoments.description: Witnesses Crocodile interrogating King Cobra about Pluton's location.
keyMoments.significance: As the only person who can read Poneglyphs, Robin is key to finding Pluton.
